summary: This mod edits Zaria , the alchemist in Falkreath, and her store Grave Concoctions
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][font=Verdana][size=4][center]
Mirz's NPC Replacer Zaria[/center][center][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2]
[/size][/font][/size][font=Verdana][size=2][/size][/font][/center][/size][/font][/b][/size][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][center]Description
===========

This mod edits [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Zaria]Zaria[/url], the alchemist in Falkreath, and her store [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Grave_Concoctions]Grave Concoctions[/url].


Details
=======

When asking Zaria what brought her to Skyrim, she replies:

[i]"Well, my family back in Hammerfell didn't approve of my interest in lethal poisons and death in general.
So I left, and wandered north. When I found this town, with its huge cemetery, I felt right at home.
I opened the shop and I've never looked back. This is where I belong."[/i]

I tried to reflect what she says in her appearance and her store, adding some more personality :)

Zaria:
-New custom skin and face textures, warpaint, eyes, brows and hair
-Edited face shape a bit
-Changed outfit and removed hat
-Custom sword
-Forwarded edits from USLEEP (not required but recommended)

Grave Concoctions interior:
-Lots of static clutter
-Few more ingredients and stuff to steal
-Lighting edited a bit
-Animated windchime with sound
-Forwarded edits from USLEEP (not required but recommended)

Grave Concoctions exterior:
-Some static clutter added to front door
-Added a small garden in the backyard

Please add screenshots and come back to endorse if you like my mod :)


Optional Files
==============

-Alternate warpaint
-Lower resolution textures
-Optional esp that makes the red light behind the counter less red
-[size=3][font=Verdana][size=2]Optional compatible esp for [/size][/font][/size][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64649/?]Lotus Poison[/url] mod
-[/size][/font][/size][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2]Optional compatible esp for [/size][/font][/size][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64649/?]Lotus Poison[/url] mod with less red light[/size][/font][/size][/size][/font][/size]


Incompatibility
===============

Conflict with mods that edits Zaria, her shop interior and exterior.
I tried to make this compatible with ELFX, it works ok for me, load my mod after ELFX.


Known Issues or Bugs
====================

-If you have met her before you install this, she might not have her new outfit. You can fix it
 with the console: Walk close to her, open console, click her, type resetinventory,
 hit enter (Not fully tested but should work)

Let me know if you find any bugs, so I can try to fix them.


Requirements
============

Skyrim
Any body replacer that works with UNP textures
[size=3][size=2][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=2](Check sticky post in comments for a workaround if you use CBBE)[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size]
KS Hairdos - Renewal (esp not needed)


Recommended mods
================

SKSE
ENB
USLEEP

=======

and other people who's stuff I have used.[/center][/size][/font][/size]
